markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Strix Kinmate](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1328)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Strix are avian humanoids with sprawling, dark-feathered wings and large talons. Strix possess angular features and piercing eyes that are fixed facing forward. Their lurching head movements and vertical eyelids give an unnerving quality to their humanoid appearances.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 18

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 16

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 13
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Monsters/Strix.png" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 2">[Strix Kinmate](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1328)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="LN" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
<trait label="Strix" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=342" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary 3](/Sources.aspx?ID=66) pg. 259</row>

**Perception** +9; [low-light vision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=23)

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Strix](/Languages.aspx?ID=50)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +8, [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10) +7, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +9

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +2

**Dex** +4

**Con** +0

**Int** +0

**Wis** +3

**Cha** +0
</row>

**Items**
[Leather Armor](/Armor.aspx?ID=4), [Shortbow](/Weapons.aspx?ID=77) (20 arrows), [Shortsword](/Weapons.aspx?ID=43)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 18 

**Fort** +6 

**Ref** +10 

**Will** +7 

</row>

**HP** 24

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet, fly 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
shortsword +10 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [versatile S](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)),
**Damage** 1d6+4 piercing

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
talon +10 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179)),
**Damage** 1d6+4 slashing

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
shortbow +10 ([deadly d10](/Traits.aspx?ID=174), [range increment 60 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248)),
**Damage** 1d6+2 piercing

**Strix Camaraderie**   Strix kinmates are tightly bonded to one another, adept at teamwork and supporting each other's attacks. If an enemy is within reach of both the kinmate and one other strix, that enemy is [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) to all strix.

**Strix Vengeance** <actions string="Free Action" /> ([Emotion](/Traits.aspx?ID=60), [Mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106)) **Frequency** once per 10 minutes; **Trigger** The kinmate or a strix ally they can see is damaged by an enemy's critical hit; **Effect** Until the end of their next turn, the kinmate gains a +1d6 status bonus to damage rolls on Strikes they make against the triggering enemy.

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-267" />
name: Strix Kinmate
